Package com.g1t11.socialmagnet.model.social

Class Thread

java.lang.Object
com.g1t11.socialmagnet.model.social.Thread
public class Thread
extends Object
Represent a thread.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Thread()
    Creates an empty thread.
    Thread​(int id)
    Creates a thread with a given ID.
    Thread​(int id, String fromUsername, String toUsername, String content, int commentCount)
    Creates a thread with specified parameters of id, from username, to username, content of the thread, count of comments.
    Thread​(int id, String fromUsername, String toUsername, String content, int commentCount, boolean tagged)
    Creates a thread with specified parameters of id, from username, to username, content of the thread, count of comments and if it is tagged.

  • Constructor Details

    • Thread

      public Thread()
      Creates an empty thread.

    • Thread

      public Thread​(int id)
      Creates a thread with a given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The thread id.

    • Thread

      public Thread​(int id, String fromUsername, String toUsername, String content, int commentCount, boolean tagged)
      Creates a thread with specified parameters of id, from username, to username, content of the thread, count of comments and if it is tagged.
      Parameters:
      id - Input id of thread.
      fromUsername - Username of owner of thread.
      toUsername - Username of user that the thread is sent to.
      content - Content of the thread.
      commentCount - Count of the comments in thread.
      tagged - If the thread is tagged.

    • Thread

      public Thread​(int id, String fromUsername, String toUsername, String content, int commentCount)
      Creates a thread with specified parameters of id, from username, to username, content of the thread, count of comments.
      Parameters:
      id - Input id of thread.
      fromUsername - Username of owner of thread.
      toUsername - Username of user that the thread is send to.
      content - Content of the thread.
      commentCount - Count of the comments in thread.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object o)
      Compares the specified object with this thread for equality. It returns true if and only if specified object is a thread where both thread have the same owner of thread, receiver of thread, content, likers, dislikers, comments, comment counts and tagged users.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
